item.title: How do you make monsters appear in moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @Kayla_not_good_enoug Kayla (not good enough)
item.description:
@Kayla_not_good_enoug wrote:

if u use ::npc it will disapear once u kill it or restart the server.
open AutoSpawn.cfg using WordPad, then add this: spawn = NPCID Coordx coordy 0 0 0 0 0 1 NewNPC leave everything else, and to get the coords, easy way is to go to the spot u want it, then logg out, and look at your character info, it will tell you your coordinants[br][size=1]Posted on: July 03, 2007, 03:59:53 PM[/size][hr]ex:this will have frogs spawn by the bankspawn = 3300 3259 3431 0 3259 3431 3259 3431 1 Froggy!! spawn = 1830 3261 3434 0 3261 3434 3261 3434 1 Froggy!! spawn = 1828 3265 3435 0 3265 3435 3265 3435 1 Froggy!! spawn = 1829 3263 3436 0 3263 3436 3263 3436 1 Froggy!! =]

Read full topic
